    1: import numpy as np
    2: 
    3: from . import util
    4: 
    5: 
    6: class TestF2Cmap(util.F2PyTest):
    7:     sources = [
    8:         util.getpath("tests", "src", "f2cmap", "isoFortranEnvMap.f90"),
    9:         util.getpath("tests", "src", "f2cmap", ".f2py_f2cmap")
   10:     ]
   11: 
   12:     # gh-15095
   13:     def test_gh15095(self):
   14:         inp = np.ones(3)
   15:         out = self.module.func1(inp)
   16:         exp_out = 3
   17:         assert out == exp_out
